tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE evaluation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_result TEXT,
    reviewer VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE leadership_evaluation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    leader_id INT,
    evaluator_name VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluation_score FLOAT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DecisionMakers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Decisions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_maker_id INT,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Evaluation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    evaluator VARCHAR(50),
    evaluation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Learning (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_id INT,
    learning_date DATE,
    learner VARCHAR(50),
    learning_description TEXT
)
